name: Vinoba Bhave University
title: Bachelor of Commerce
description: I have obtained a Bachelor of Commerce degree from Vinoba Bhave University. This program provided me with a comprehensive understanding of various business and financial concepts. Through my studies, I gained insights into accounting, economics, management, and other related subjects.
